texts.name: Azar
texts.biography: Abandoned in AvLee as a child and raised among unicorns, Azar’s path led him to embrace druidic powers before joining Shayan’s kingdom. Rumors swirl of his connection to Nightmares, born from a tragic attempt to resurrect a fallen unicorn into the door to hell, leaving a trail of dark magic in his wake.

specialty.name: Hell Steed
specialty.description:
{Hell Steed}

Increases the Attack and Defense skills of any Hell Steed or Nightmare for each level attained after 5th level.
